analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: STABLE NEUTRALITY AMIDST STRATEGIC HARD ASSET ROTATION. The GMS print of 48 dictates a neutral posture as the fiscal-monetary nexus stabilizes within Phase 2 transition weights. While credit spread compression in the HY sector suggests resilient solvency, the flat OGV vector and 1.77% real interest rate preclude aggressive equity expansion. Capital flows prioritize commodity convexityâ€”evidenced by copper and gold appreciationâ€”offsetting crypto-sentiment degradation. Tactical patience is required until regime acceleration clears the 55-threshold. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]

reports.EN: STABLE NEUTRALITY AMIDST STRATEGIC HARD ASSET ROTATION. The GMS print of 48 dictates a neutral posture as the fiscal-monetary nexus stabilizes within Phase 2 transition weights. While credit spread compression in the HY sector suggests resilient solvency, the flat OGV vector and 1.77% real interest rate preclude aggressive equity expansion. Capital flows prioritize commodity convexityâ€”evidenced by copper and gold appreciationâ€”offsetting crypto-sentiment degradation. Tactical patience is required until regime acceleration clears the 55-threshold. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]

reports.ES: NEUTRALIDAD ESTABLE ANTE ROTACIÃ“N ESTRATÃ‰GICA DE ACTIVOS. El GMS de 48 dicta una postura neutral mientras el nexo fiscal-monetario se estabiliza en la Fase 2. Aunque la compresiÃ³n de spreads de crÃ©dito sugiere solvencia, el vector OGV plano y la tasa real del 1,77% impiden la expansiÃ³n agresiva de renta variable. Los flujos priorizan la convexidad de materias primas (oro/cobre), compensando la degradaciÃ³n del sentimiento cripto. Se requiere paciencia tÃ¡ctica hasta que la aceleraciÃ³n del rÃ©gimen supere el umbral de 55. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]

reports.ID: NETRALITAS STABIL DI TENGAH ROTASI ASET STRATEGIS. Skor GMS 48 mendikte postur netral saat neksus fiskal-moneter stabil dalam transisi Fase 2. Meskipun kompresi spread kredit menunjukkan solvensi tangguh, vektor OGV datar dan suku bunga riil 1,77% menghambat ekspansi ekuitas agresif. Aliran modal memprioritaskan konveksitas komoditas (emas/tembaga), mengimbangi degradasi sentimen kripto. Kesabaran taktis diperlukan hingga akselerasi rezim menembus ambang batas 55 secara definitif. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]

reports.DE: STABILE NEUTRALITÃ„T BEI STRATEGISCHER SACHWERTEROTATION. Der GMS-Wert von 48 erzwingt eine neutrale Haltung, wÃ¤hrend sich der Fiskal-MonetÃ¤r-Nexus in Phase 2 stabilisiert. Trotz Kreditspread-Kompression im HY-Sektor verhindern der flache OGV-Vektor und ein Realzins von 1,77 % eine aggressive Expansion. KapitalflÃ¼sse bevorzugen Rohstoff-KonvexitÃ¤t (Gold/Kupfer) und neutralisieren die Degradierung des Krypto-Sentiments. Taktische Geduld ist geboten, bis die Regime-Beschleunigung die 55er-Schwelle durchbricht. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]
reports.FR: NEUTRALITÃ‰ STABLE SOUS ROTATION STRATÃ‰GIQUE DES ACTIFS. Le GMS de 48 impose une posture neutre alors que le nexus fiscaux-monÃ©taire se stabilise en Phase 2. Bien que la compression des spreads de crÃ©dit signale une solvabilitÃ© rÃ©siliente, le vecteur OGV plat et un taux d'intÃ©rÃªt rÃ©el de 1,77 % limitent l'expansion agressive des actions. Les flux de capitaux privilÃ©gient la convexitÃ© des matiÃ¨res premiÃ¨res, compensant la dÃ©gradation du sentiment crypto. Une patience tactique s'impose jusqu'Ã  ce que l'accÃ©lÃ©ration dÃ©passe le seuil de 55. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]
